titles: A booke of epitaphes made vpon the death of the right worshipfull Sir VVilliam Buttes knight vvho deceased the third day of September, anno 1583.
author: Dallington, Robert, 1561-1637.
notes: Running title reads: Epitaphes vpon the death Sir William Buttes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
